  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zlaganje opek</string>
            <string language="en">The Stacking of Bricks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Stapeln der Ziegelsteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'empilement des briques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O empilhamento dos tijolos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'impilamento dei mattoni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συσσώρευση των τούβλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El empilar de ladrillos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Opeke so zložene ena vrh druge in se lahko vodoravno premikajo med seboj.</string>
            <string language="en">The bricks are stacked one on top of the other and cen be moved in horizontal direction to find the equilibrium.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stabilnost</string>
            <string language="en">stability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">težišče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ziegelsteine werden einer auf den anderen 
gestapelt und cen werden verschoben in horizontale Richtung, um das 
Gleichgewicht zu finden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les briques sont empilées une sur l'autre et cen
soient déplacées la direction horizontale pour trouver l'équilibre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os tijolos são empilhados um no alto do outro e 
cen sejam movidos no sentido horizontal para encontrar o equilíbrio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I mattoni sono impilati uno in cima all'altro e 
cen sono spostati nel senso orizzontale per trovare l'equilibrio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα τούβλα είναι συσσωρευμένο ένα πάνω από το άλλο 
και η CEN κινείται στην οριζόντια κατεύθυνση για να βρεί την 
ισορροπία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ladrillos se empilan uno encima del otro y 
cen se muevan en la dirección horizontal para encontrar el 
equilibrio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabilität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stabilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centro di massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταθερότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο της μάζας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estabilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">centro de la masa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">statics</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
